testsuite.name: Support adding Jenkins via Puppet on Debian machines

testcase.classname: Support adding Jenkins via Puppet on Debian machines
testcase.name: Install Jenkins via Puppet
testcase.failure:
Scenario: Install Jenkins via Puppet
Given I have a running Ubuntu VM And I have Puppet installed And the Jenkins module is on the machine Given the manifest: When I provision the machine Then I should have Jenkins installed
Message:
undefined method `gsub' for nil:NilClass (NoMethodError) ./features/step_definitions/deb_support_steps.rb:25:in `/^the Jenkins module is on the machine$/' features/deb_support.feature:10:in `And the Jenkins module is on the machine'
